==What to Do==
Compile production binaries with Automatic Reference Counting(ARC) enabled. ARC is only available on iOS 5 and higher.
==Why==
Using Automatic Reference Counting prevents use-after-free vulnerabilities.
==How==
To enable Automatic Reference Counting(ARC):
# **Use a compatible SDK.** Use iOS SDK 5.0 or higher to be able to use Automatic Reference Counting. # **Launch XCode.** Open the XCode environment. # **Enable Automatic Reference Counting.** Set the compiler option //Objective-C Automatic Reference Counting// to //yes//.
